categories: Category:Battles of the invasion of the Tython system

nodes.text: After capturing the gas giants Obri and Mawr during their invasion of the Tython system, the Infinite Empire of the Rakata species attacked the planet Tython, as Predor Skal'nas hoped to secure the Infinity Gate rumored to exist there. However, the Je'daii Order repelled the Rakatan assault. Forced back, the Infinite Empire captured the planet of Ska Gora instead.
The battle at Tython was first mentioned in the comic book Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 1, a comic book written by John Ostrander and released on November 20, 2013.
